players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to think carefully about who could have done this - it has to be one of us three remaining."

Charlie: "I agree with Bob. We need to be vigilant and work together to figure out who among us could have committed this heinous act. Let's consider everyone's actions and words during the discussion and voting phases so far."
You: "Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the mafioso. Let's be cautious and consider his actions carefully during our discussions and votes."
Bob: "Alice, that's a very serious accusation! What investigation are you talking about? As far as I know, none of us have any special abilities to investigate. Are you claiming to be the detective?"

You: "Bob, your inconsistencies during the first discussion raised suspicion. Your denial of any investigation abilities also seems suspicious given that I have proven to be the detective. It's important we maintain trust and transparency in this game."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
